[(1, '# Portfolio Deck\n\n![Image](images/photo_02.png)\n\n<h2>Denis Burakov</h2>\n\n[![GitHub Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/github-%23121011.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=github&logoColor=white)](https://www.github.com/deburky)\n[![RP Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/jupyter-%23FA0F00.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=jupyter&logoColor=white)](https://www.risk-practitioner.com)\n\nThis deck contains a portfolio of materials about the use of machine learning models in lending business and credit risk management.\n\n## Designing AI Undewriters\n\nThe integration of AI into modern loan underwriting is reshaping how institutions approach credit decisioning. As borrower profiles become more dynamic and regulatory expectations grow, traditional scoring models — including those based on transactional patterns — remain essential, but often fall short when addressing edge cases or adapting in real time.', '{"source": "finance_docs"}', '[-0.09044385701417923, 0.02754190005362034, -0.04731934890151024, -0.009879084303975105, 0.0764988362789154, -0.003791502909734845, 0.10011688619852066, -0.000856805476360023, -0.04128342494368553, -0.02878729999065399]'), (2, 'With the advent of large language models (LLMs), financial institutions can now deploy multi-agent AI systems, where each agent specializes in a specific underwriting task. One may extract key financial data from applications, another align decisions with policy or regulatory frameworks, and a third evaluate contextual risk and generate recommendations. Throughout the process, a human underwriter remains in the loop — providing oversight, ensuring accountability, and stepping in where expert judgment is required.\n\nThis collaborative framework not only accelerates decision-making but also improves consistency, transparency, and adaptability across the underwriting pipeline — as illustrated in the diagram below.\n\n![Application workflow](images/underwriting/underwriting_00.jpeg)', '{"source": "finance_docs"}', '[-0.019346047192811966, -0.013796653598546982, -0.06682858616113663, 0.024856215342879295, -0.01087066251784563,
